name: http-crash-course
description: - HTTP is Stateless - HTTPS - SSL/TLS data sent is enscypted - HTTP Methods - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE - HTTP Request - Header and Body - HTTP Headers   - Request - Cookies, Accept-xxx, Content-Type, Content-Length, Authorization, User-Agent, Referrer   - Response - Server, Set Cookie, Content Type, Content-Length, Date   - General - URL, Method, Status Code, Remote Address, Rererrer Policy
